title: Something Beautiful: The Stories Behind a Half-Century of the Songs of Bill and Gloria Gaither
description: What began 50 years ago, when two high-school English teachers in an Indiana farm community began writing songs to express spiritual insights, has become a volume of church standards sung the world over. Bill and GloriaGaither's songs have found permanenthomes in people's heartsand hymnals, making this coupleamong the most prolific and popularin Christian music history. Nowfans and music lovers can see insidethe inspiration and life eventsthat created the songs they singmost, including Because He Lives,There's Something About That Name, and The Family ofGod. In her trademark elegant prose, Gloria has created abeautiful keepsake for all those who love Christian musicand its history.
author: Gloria Gaither
